name: You Broke It!
description:
You Broke It! v1.0.1 Controls

WASD: Move & Jump.

Mouse: Aim and shoot.

Spacebar: Skip dialogue.

Story

The mainframe controlling the robot community living on a distant planet, malfunctions while Tiny Robot is in the room. All other robots unite against the Tiny Robot and nothing seems to get better until the mainframe is reset.

Gameplay

Help the Tiny Robot reach the mainframe and reset it with the keys you have collected. The life of other robots is at your mercy :)
